body:
Both servers are pretty much the same. I saw this thread and decided to share it.Not intending to start a flame war, I'm just curious c=.

https://oc.tc/forums/topics/56ca6d745f35b97d8500000e

I personally prefer Avicus because I'm familiar with it. But for the couple of times I got temp banned and switched to OCN it was a different experience. It's Nice but small community, with a lot of drama vs Big and tryhard, with it's fair share of salt but also of friendliness, imo.

Let's be honest here, most of the OCN guys accusing Avicus of copying/stealing OCN on the other thread haven't played here long enough to realize how different it is.

Which is sad. I've tried to introduce some of my OCN friends here, some who had never played on the server before. And they all thought that Avicus is the "copy-cat OCN".

replies.body:
OCN confuses me, Avicus is much easier to understand xD

+1 for Avicus
replies.body_tagged:
OCN confuses me, Avicus is much easier to understand xD

+1 for Avicus

replies.body:
Having played on both servers I have to say I enjoy Overcast much, much more. I haven't played Minecraft in a while but I still go on the forums, and I really think the community and gameplay on OCN is better.

The gameplay is less laggy, more organized. The maps have nice aesthetics, whereas the maps on here are bland and boring. Chat is more clean and easy to read on OCN too. Tournaments are also more organized, and also maps are more balanced.

No offense to anyone, but some of the members in this community are annoying, immature, and are way too competitive. People on here seem to compete over the tiniest thing (seeing a thread about how people were bragging about their KB was pretty sad), and generally act like 12-year-olds when anyone talks negatively about them, their team, Avicus etc. I'm really not trying to diss Avicus, as it has it's good parts, but I just prefer OCN over Avicus.
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
Hey guys,

Both servers are great! There really isn't any need to argue so much over here. As I stated before, resentment between both servers is bad for both of our interests. Personally, I enjoy OCN when I get on it. The regulars seem pretty nice, (the ones who come here). I may not know a whole lot of the community over yonder; however, I do know that both communities have their ups and downs. OCN and Avicus are not copies of each other, they are merely siblings so to speak. The original Nebula plugin for Avicus was coded by ParaPenguin, not copied (just fyi). The reasons why Nebula and Project Ares are so similar (in idea) is that they were coded by people with the same objectives/ideas in mind. Anywho, OCN is great, and so is Avicus. I don't see the need for hate from any side of the spectrum. Infact, the Avicus Seniors and the OCN Seniors both share the same goal in furthering Minecraft's competitive nature! As Martin said on the Overcast forums, "All the competitive Minecraft networks share a common aim - to push the competitive game forward and get more people involved in playing it. There's no reason for animosity between our communities."
